website_summaries.verdict: A perfect mess kit for the outdoor enthusiast who doesn't want to be weighed down, but also doesn't want to leave anything important behind.
pros: Lightweight aluminum mess kit with 18 pieces, including a nonstick pot and pan
Cleaning sponge and travel bag included
cons: Some users are concerned about the plastic handles melting near the fire

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Can't really beat the price. Also came with a paracord compass bracelet which helped me complete my camping/survival kit without having to make an extra purchase. It's very lightweight and compact, yet spacious enough to make a meal for 2 adults and maybe 2 children. I'd recommend a non-scratch brilo pad for cleaning. You can also purchase natural dish soap that would be fine for the environment to take on the trip.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Albertson

customer_reviews.title: The stove seems a little flimsy however it did work wonderful, on high it rips through the fuel so ...
customer_reviews.text: Was impressed with the quality of the pots. The stove seems a little flimsy however it did work wonderful, on high it rips through the fuel so be careful there. I would advise spraying the pans or coating them before cooking, the eggs I made really stuck even when using butter on them bottom. I also used them on an over the fire grate, they worked however I do not recommend this, the handles started to turn brown, they didn't melt.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Verley

customer_reviews.title: Conveniently compact
customer_reviews.text: This set came with a great deal of many things that are extremely usefu like: A fire starter that I didn't know was included, bracelet with a compass, an addition for a stove-top in propane tank, and additional silverware along the metal spork. Will update once actually used outdoors but very happy with the condition it all came in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Used this multiple times, stream side when trout fishing to backcountry camping. Great for cooking eggs to boiling water for freeze dried meals. It is all nicely compact and perfect to fit in your bag. Pans and bowls aren’t the biggest but work for two people when having something compact is key.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Great set, excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: I loved this kit in terms of compacting and how lightweight it was. The pieces are very easy to use and unpack. There was one pan that burned unexpectedly with a small backpacking stove. However, I am still rating them five stars for excellent customer service and fixing the situation. They did assure me that it is unusual for the pan to burn and it was a simple manufacturing mistake. I highly recommend this product and this company, as I will definitely be looking to them for future equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Osmanski

customer_reviews.title: Compact and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: These are lightweight, compact for storage, and the burner that came with it works flawlessly. I’ve used this multiple times and had worked fine each use! The pans are easy to clean and dry quickly as well!
customer_reviews.author: Alden White

customer_reviews.title: Nice complete cooking kit
customer_reviews.text: I gave this kit as part of a wedding gift, so I haven’t used it. But, on inspecting it, I noticed it had quite a large dent in the pot. I didn’t have time to return it before the wedding. The dent didn’t make it unusable, but I would have liked it not to be there. I included this with a backpacking stove. The folding ladle made me want to order another one, pretty cool!
customer_reviews.author: china mom

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Took this camping recently and it was awesome! The only thing I will say is that the little bowls were a tad on the small side but it was overall very lightweight and the pans balanced well on the stove and because I had the MountainHouse food I didn’t even need the bowls!
customer_reviews.author: SunnyDaysAlways

customer_reviews.title: The protective grey coating is coming off.
customer_reviews.text: Beware!!! This is cheap, very cheap, the grey paint/anodized coating is coming off the pot. It's only been hand washed while I was camping and I wonder how toxic it might be. Do yourself a favor and buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Simone

customer_reviews.title: I always thought I'd invest in something like a JetBoil for camping
customer_reviews.text: Saw this on sale on amazon. I always thought I'd invest in something like a JetBoil for camping, but didn't want to spend the money. This little set is awesome! didn't take everything on my backpacking trip, but what I did bring was awesome! brought the igniter/stand and the larger pot with lid. It was lightweight and super easy to use, we were very happy with it, can't beat the price either. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: MarCo

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit. Seems strange that it has plastic handles ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice kit. Seems strange that it has plastic handles though. And wood spoon is just a tad too large to fit in the kit. I was surprised that it included a little stove with it too. And the stove has a built in igniter. It also has a fire starter. I think I’ll keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Redreed

customer_reviews.title: Arrived exactly as promised!
customer_reviews.text: I have not had a chance to use this yet but it arrived here as promised and seems to be a great product. I look forward to using this on the trail and hope that it will last for many adventures in the future. I really like that this kit came with the mini-stove, I had been looking to purchase this stove and a mess kit like this separately but the fact they came together like this was the deciding factor in my purchase of this item.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Cookware
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this yet. I bought it for an up coming trip. Everything looks to be durabile and will be useful. I was surprised though by how small the cookware is. I may have missed it in the description but the pictures made all of the pieces look larger. Being that I will be cooking for a family, I have had to get some larger pieces. But, if just cooking for 1 or maybe 2 people this is a good set.
customer_reviews.author: brett

customer_reviews.title: Great for backpacking!
customer_reviews.text: This is in my car emergency kit and bugout bag. This would be great for backpackers it compacts to small size and has a pull-string bag that fits all pieces.
customer_reviews.author: amrsnoopy

customer_reviews.title: Tiny
customer_reviews.text: Teeny tiny! Yes, I probably should have read the dimensions before I bought it. Seriously though, it is like a child's camping set.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Abels

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for backpacking
customer_reviews.text: Great little cookware and mess kit! Use it for backpacking and camping. Very lightweight, but still durable! Comes with everything you’d need and then some!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Kainz

customer_reviews.title: Light weight stove
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It is light weight and easy to carry on the outside of my pack. Super helpful when I am hiking in the Cascade mountains or just trekking across the forest for days on end. This all in one kit is just fantastic and easy to use. Wonderful product! I cant say enough how much I enjoy it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor gear
customer_reviews.text: Being an avid outdoors man I very much enjoy how light weight and compact it is. Takes up very little space in any pack. Unlike other mess kits I've bought I appreciate how this kit came with everything for two people or one including a burner unit and fire rod. I recommend this to anyone that is avid in outdoor activities. Looking forward to checking out and purchasing other mallo products
customer_reviews.author: Jabele

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The wooden spoon doesn’t fit in the pot, so it’s not collapsable or compact. The expandable stove never worked. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MJPandolph

customer_reviews.title: Arrived fast and so far it’s been outstanding.
customer_reviews.text: It came amazingly quick, great for an individual but in time of need you could definitely feed a couple people. I’ve used it this week to make my lunches. I’m a contractor on job sites without power at times. Had a hot meal everyday this week. I would definitely buy again and will get the larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Paul  Fremling

customer_reviews.title: camping gear, outdoors man must have
customer_reviews.text: Blew me away. Well worth it for the money and they give you little extras. Thank you and I will be buying more from them.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew s.

customer_reviews.title: Very affordable and light weight
customer_reviews.text: This kit is amazingly inexpensive, Lightweight, and good quality. It’s served us well on our three day camping.
customer_reviews.author: Gil B.

customer_reviews.title: Compact, light, thoughtful
customer_reviews.text: This neat little kit is well thought out. Add some camp soap and propaine and you are ready to cook almost anywhere
customer_reviews.author: Juliana L. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: I was doubtful at first coz it is cheap compared to other cookware brands. But i was able to cook great meals during our 4 days backpacking. No more cold meals!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. RaJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hikes!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it as a gift for my father. It was very light weight. We took it apart to check how easy it is to clean and put back together and it wasnt hard at all. He can't wait to go camping and fishing and bring it with him.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie k

customer_reviews.title: A quality product from a fine company.
customer_reviews.text: Small problem with order, but seller quickly resolved it. Good product. Can't wait to go camping.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Powell

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly you looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, very small and look like your kid toy. unbelievable.
customer_reviews.author: Dinh N.

customer_reviews.title: More than expected 😊
customer_reviews.text: Has everything needed to cook, boil or fry! Perfect for solo adventures. I would recommend the 2 quart for multiple folks.
customer_reviews.author: Your Brother Man

customer_reviews.title: 100% recommend!
customer_reviews.text: My husband absolutely loved it! It is perfect for him. We plan to use it on our next hiking trip. It was a great Father's day gift. Perfectly sized to make carrying it easy. The bracelet is perfect for him to wear. He is super excited about it. Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Belknap

customer_reviews.title: Everything we needed
customer_reviews.text: This was everything we needed (except two things of propane) for a two week car camping trip. It was all durable and a perfect size for two people. It’s smaller than it looks and wouldn’t take up much space in a backpack either. We just wished the bowls were a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: D. Resner

customer_reviews.title: camping
customer_reviews.text: i have the emergency cooking set with me when i travel
customer_reviews.author: benigo t toda III

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, compact
customer_reviews.text: We have only used this once so far but it worked well. The pot and pan are a bit small but it is perfect for backpacking. We just ate what fit and then made some more. The burner focuses heat in the center so there is a burn spot on our pot now. Just make sure to keep stirring to avoid burning in the center.
customer_reviews.author: Alyx Belisle

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect set for me! I do a lot of camping/mountain biking trips alone, and it cuts down on the gear I have to haul. I premake most of my meals, and the set is ideal for me heating or cooking over fire, or the included butane heater. Great product at a great price! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Bob Jacques

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I tried a couple of times in some tracks and it works really good. The big pot is perfect for soups, milk.... but the small pan could be better, anyway it's ok as well. The product was really useful
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I love my cookware set! It is exactly what I needed. I’m actually going to purchase more of these as gifts this year. They are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Elena Kayne

customer_reviews.title: Cookware great.... tableware not so much
customer_reviews.text: The pot, pan and stove are good. I also like the spatula. But the bowls and the silverware seem cheap and kind of take away from the whole package. Probably some aluminum silverware and some silicon bowls would be better. Cookware is good for the price though
customer_reviews.author: anthony samani

customer_reviews.title: Bug out kit
customer_reviews.text: I love this compact set I keep it in my truck in case of an emergency
customer_reviews.author: mjg

customer_reviews.title: good evacuation kit
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this kit in advance of hurricane. lightweight and small enough to pack for evacuation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excelent products
customer_reviews.text: I have two different mallo me cook sers, and a sleeping bag. All products are very nice, top quality, and a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Darin Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Compact, Durable Cookware!
customer_reviews.text: The portability of this set is great, as it nests inside of itself to maximize on storage space when camping! It’s a great gift for the camper in your life!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Backpacking size
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for backpacking this upcoming summer. I didn't realize how small it was which is a good thing. Less weight is better. It would be nice if it came with a plate but it's not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Herrmann

customer_reviews.title: purchased for my grandson
customer_reviews.text: This looks like a great product- we purchased it for my grandson to use in Boy Scouts. He has not gone on camp outs yet this season but is scheduled to in the summer. I'm sure he will enjoy this product!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressed
customer_reviews.text: Does not all hook together as stated, is much smaller than expected and I anticipate it not having much durability
customer_reviews.author: Brenda E

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Too small. Although they mention the size but I didn’t notice. But the quality it pretty cheap and hard to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedeh

customer_reviews.title: So compact! 👌🏽
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Everything is so cute and compact. I got this for backpacking and I was more than pleased with the size and quality of everything. It’s also a great gift 😊
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Felt like this was very cheaply made. It started to fall apart the moment we opened it up. And also Pieces were already broken.
customer_reviews.author: N. Scott Green

customer_reviews.title: Bad design
customer_reviews.text: The pot handles cause them to be unbalanced on the burner and nearly impossible to use them without constantly holding them. This product would be better used as a toy.
customer_reviews.author: andres v.

customer_reviews.title: Must have for camping!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lightweight cooking set! It has everything !!!!
customer_reviews.author: lesley

customer_reviews.title: Multipurpose
customer_reviews.text: Handles could be a heat resistant plastic but overall such a great buy. Great for bug out bags as well
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B

customer_reviews.title: So compact and functional!
customer_reviews.text: I'm normally an overpacker when I backpack, so knowing that everything I'll need to cook is in this compact little bag is super reassuring, and I've used the contents three times so far, and it hasn't let me down yet!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: We took the mess kit primitive camping and it was perfect! It consolidates pretty small and comes with a pouch to hold everything together. Not a bad purchase, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, compact and convenient
customer_reviews.text: 2nd set I purchased. Absolutely love this kit its compact and you don't even need a lighter. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: shoua thao

customer_reviews.title: The Price is Right the product is good!
customer_reviews.text: Like the Simplicity of being able to take with me anywhere! Make the colors! Taking it camping soon!
customer_reviews.author: mmcgruder

customer_reviews.title: Great for gifts or yourself!
customer_reviews.text: I have this set to my brother-in-law for Christmas and he thought it was perfect for their camping trips! It was light weight and good quality. I will be ordering another for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: It's simply a great cook set!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set about a month ago. Only used it once but totally lived up to my expectations. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Seim

customer_reviews.title: Great kit.
customer_reviews.text: Everything works as expected. Decent size for backpacking. Lightweight enough.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Great set, great value!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great set for my son for Boy Scouts! It has everything he needs!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Puschinsky

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING QUALITY!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little product! Lightweight! Has everything I need and Amazing quality for such a low price!
customer_reviews.author: Nic Savage

customer_reviews.title: The handle of the pan fried
customer_reviews.text: The handle of the pan fried is not tight, I think there is a problem with the production, the other is good,
customer_reviews.author: Zhuren Li

customer_reviews.title: Easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used it yet. But it’s light weight and comes with the essentials. Easy to fit in your standard backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got me through
customer_reviews.text: This set got me through some tough times. I don’t wanna talk about it.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick max greiner

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with the kit!
customer_reviews.text: Kit came with more than I asked for. No complaints! Lightweight, fast and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Koby

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you very much!!! I am very happy with it, looks great!!! And thanks for te ebook!!! We will try all the recipes!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rolando H treviqo D

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight
customer_reviews.text: Havent used it yet but pleased with everything I have seen, can’t wait to use it!
customer_reviews.author: D.R.Frame

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy seller
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy transaction. MalloMe makes lightweight, yet rugged equipment for the hiker and adventure-seeker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For real campers
customer_reviews.text: It is so perfect for the kind of camping I do. (Not glamping)
customer_reviews.author: Amber Van Dellen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Scouts
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old loves this kit for scouts! Just the right weight and size!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Richter

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service and lightweight cookware!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing customer service and we are excited to use this convenient cookware set for backpacking Colorado this summer!
customer_reviews.author: kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Quality and compact
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the quality product looking forward to many years of service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping
customer_reviews.text: Great for camping. Small and portable for backpacking. Survival wrist band is a bit large but not a necessary item.
customer_reviews.author: Wliu

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set.
customer_reviews.text: Great starter set. I got it for my Wife just started camping/backpacking.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen S. Painter

customer_reviews.title: lighweight
customer_reviews.text: gave this to my son for a christmas present. He loves the lightweight and compact nature of the kit.
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My brother is a big camper, so I got this set for him as a present. He LOVES it!
customer_reviews.author: AWilliams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The kit is perfect for camping, it is lightweight and durable. My Boy Scout absolutely loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda V

customer_reviews.title: Great little cook set
customer_reviews.text: Used once and love it, its well made. Very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Tami J Goshert

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Bowls were way too small. Also the base for pot and pan was really light. I returned it would look for Stanley product.
customer_reviews.author: IB

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: fair price and great for travelling. Smaller than I expected, but it makes sense
customer_reviews.author: Blake K

customer_reviews.title: Compact and Complete
customer_reviews.text: Love how compact this complete cookware set is! Easy to use easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla JA

customer_reviews.title: Great all in one set
customer_reviews.text: Great set, gifted this to my son for his camping adventures.
customer_reviews.author: Irene R.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Backpacking
customer_reviews.text: This kit was amazing for backpacking! We really enjoyed this kit as it included the stove which was easy and reliable. The kit was great for making MREs for backpacking as it included everything we needed besides fuel and food. I was very impressed with the compact, light stove with the kit and the affordability of this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Shoppers

product_meta.title: MalloMe Camping Cookware Mess Kit Backpacking Gear & Hiking Outdoors Bug Out Bag Cooking Equipment Cookset | Lightweight, Compact, Durable Pot Pan Bowls (Green 1L 18 pc)
feature_bullets: BUILT TO LAST! Highest Quality Non-Toxic Anodized Aluminum Camping Cookset conducts heat quickly and is survival gear that is built to last and is perfect size for 1 youth scout or adult hiker backpacker. EASY CLEANING & STORAGE: Entire 18 piece mess kit collapses into small bundle for easy control and storage

ALL-IN-ONE COOKWARE MEGA BUNDLE : The 10 Piece Camping Campfire Cookware Mess Kit includes Anodized Aluminum Nonstick Pot + Pot Cover + Nonstick Pan + 2 Bowls + Folding Stainless Steel Spork + Soup Spoon + Wooden Spoon Spatula + Cleaning Sponge + Nylon Travel Bag Drawstring Pouch.

WORRY FREE WILDERNESS: Finally enjoy the great outdoors without second guessing if you packed everything to cook and serve your next meal with the lightweight, compact, and mobile design of the Camp Kitchen Set

PERFECT GIFT for FAMILY and FRIENDS: #1 Outdoor Cooking Backpacking Gear & Camping Backpack and Hiking Picnic Set for anyone looking for a high quality, great value product for the camping world or bug out bag to enjoy at the cookout with the people you love
